UserPrefs - Class in com.sprhibrad.framework.model
It hosts the user preferences : the 'mode' of the menu (horizontal at the top OR vertical on the left) and the user's Locale (that drives any format a part from the currency format that is set at application level - see the configuration file of SprHibRAD application)
